        public static void showToast(String message,
             int duration)
        Show the Toast on the current Thread.
        Parameters:
        message - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT Toast.LENGTH_LONG

      • showToast

        public static void showToast(String message,
             int duration,
             Integer gravity,
             Integer xOffset,
             Integer yOffset)
        Show the Toast on the current Thread.
        Parameters:
        message - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT Toast.LENGTH_LONG
        gravity - The location at which the notification should appear on the screen.
        xOffset - The X offset in pixels to apply to the gravity's location.
        yOffset - The Y offset in pixels to apply to the gravity's location.

      • showCustomToast

        public static void showCustomToast(Integer imageId,
                   String message,
                   int duration,
                   Integer gravity,
                   Integer xOffset,
                   Integer yOffset)
        Show the Toast on the current Thread.
        Parameters:
        imageId - The id of the image to display
        message - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT Toast.LENGTH_LONG
        gravity - The location at which the notification should appear on the screen.
        xOffset - The X offset in pixels to apply to the gravity's location.
        yOffset - The Y offset in pixels to apply to the gravity's location.
